h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear Location
content: Weapons can be crafted throughout the game from the Shrines throughout the game's six chapters. Crafting weapons will require Will and various Crafting Materials from the game's locales and enemies. However, the Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear can't be crafted.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tri-Point_Double-Edged_Spear.md', within the main section titled 'Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear Location'.
The content is as follows:
Weapons can be crafted throughout the game from the Shrines throughout the game's six chapters. Crafting weapons will require Will and various Crafting Materials from the game's locales and enemies. However, the Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear can't be crafted.
